reviews.review: No character development, can't believe some characters are being such a pain to the others with egos, all in all just a slam bam thank you maam movie. Although the plot did take an unexpected surprise, a lot of the heroes who survived countless battles just simply died...   interesting to see what's next for the Avengers after this movie.
Epic blockbuster, this is the movie you were waiting for. Excellent job, unexpected plot, great acting. The Herculean feat of Russo Brothers is probably the best of the decade. Rating: 8.5/10

I have witnessed #avengersinfinitywar in #imax 3D. This is literally the biggest scale production movie I've ever watched in my life. ---***NOW FOR SPOILER***---
The movies starts off from the last moment of #thorragnarok . Asgardians killed and #Thor is seriously injured. #Thanos already destroyed Xandar & took the Power stone. Thanos bashes #Hulk until his so down. #Heimdall uses all his strength to shoot Hulk into hyperspace till he lands into The Sanctum. Thanos came to #Loki for Space stone. Thanos kills Loki & take the Space stone & let Thor die.

Thor reaches to #Milano where the guardians save him. He instructs #Starlord & #Gamora to go to #Knowhere to get Reality stone from collector. Thor brings #rocket & #groot to Nidaviller to forge his new hammer #Stormbreaker. In Knowhere Thanos already found the Reality stone & abducts Gamora to Titan.

Thanos uses Nebula to make Gamora tell the location of the #SoulStone. She finally breaks the pot and its in #Vormir. Thanos and Gamora go to Vormir and confronts Red Skull (yeah that guy, SHOCKING!). For the stone Thanos has to sacrifice one soul who he loves truly. In tears he pushes Gamora to death and gets the SOUL STONE ?????? Thor risked his life to forge the hammer & Groot cuts his hand to bind the hammer as handle (best scene I loved). Cap brings Vision and his entire team to #Wakanda. There they have the biggest massive WAR ever!

Thanos fights #IronMan #spiderman #starlord #mantis #drax & #drstrange
Strange bargains the Time stone for Stark's life. Thanos finally comes to EARTH - WAKANDA for Mind stone. Thanos rips Mind stone & Vision dies. Thor fights Thanos and Thanos snaps his finger! ??

#infinitywar
#avengers
This movie is quite an accomplishment. It is one of the best films you will ever see in terms of magnitude and how 10 years culminated into one cinematic achievement.

I loved the movie... I watched it 15 times in past 3 days... and will watch it more..

lame movie if there is going to be part 2 put part 1 in the title so i know to wait. last marvel movie i see at theaters this is like lord of the rings all over again
Could have been better,but still the movie was very well done with loads storylines & emotions...
The film as per usual with the MCU has many flaws which seem to have been ignored over the last 10 years.
